title: Equinox Dawn is Trialing Top & Support for OOL Split 2
body:
Equinox Dawn finished third in Split 1 of the Oceanic Open Ladder.

We are looking for a Top & Support to join us for Split 2 of OOL.

We Require the successful candidates to have:
Working Microphone
Stable Net
Competitive drive
Be Self Critical
Capability to function in a team based environment.
Scrim Availability

Role Specific:
We would require the support player to have some shotcalling experience to field the role as a shotcaller or secondary shotcaller.
Understand competitive gameplay or at the least how their role impacts the team in competitive play.
Willingness to pick up champions based on meta shifts.

We would require the top player to have an understanding of match ups in top lane meta.
Ability to lane safely as well as understand wave manipulation
Willingness to pick up champions based on meta shifts

Although we have a larger range of requirements we are specifically after a team player who values teamwork and can orchestrate proactively with the team. Both players in each of the roles will have to be proficient in the champions they play as well as have an understanding of their roles to a higher standard than other players. For this reason alone we will only be taking in applicants of Diamond 3 and above.

Contact IGN: SexyMario258 or LincDawg for trial times
